content: In the world of Harry Potter, what magical object was believed to grant immortality and unlimited wealth, sought after by Nicolas Flamel?

In the wizarding world of Harry Potter, the magical object believed to grant immortality and unlimited wealth was the Philosopher's Stone (known as the Sorcerer's Stone in the United States). It was famously created by the alchemist Nicolas Flamel, who used the stone's elixir to extend his life for centuries. The stone plays a central role in the first book and film of the series, where Harry Potter and his friends must protect it from falling into the wrong hands, specifically those of the evil wizard Voldemort.
